title: TUESDAY TEAMFIGHT! Come play vs the Boards Dev team!!
body:
Game starts at 2pm PST (5 minutes!)

Game name: TUESDAY TEAMFIGHT
Password: BACON  <--- all caps

**EDIT: GAME COMPLETED! Catch us next Tuesday for another TUESDAY TEAMFIGHT**

-The Boards Team{{champion:111}}

replies.body:
Crush Mode: [ON] OFF

{{champion:56}} Be scared, very scared.
Can this be a regular thing? Please make this a regular thing.
by the power of Baconskull, I am going to try my damndest to make it a regular thang.
Crying cause its either full or i cant find it
IF YOU PLAY AGAIN YOU ARE GETTING FIZZBANNED SO HARD
Looks like the boards team is at it again. Jump in and show us how this game is played!

Sorry, gonna have to down vote this so no one sees this thread and I can play with you guys every week :D




jk
(Not gonna up vote tho.... ;). )
Damn would be nice to actually meet some developers in game would be great to see a (non toxic game) for once, of course the developers know all the tricks though ^^.
Don't worry, we'll do it again next week :D
